sense.gloss: root (of a problem, etc.), base, foundation, origin, source

sdata.j: ↑刑事↑↓けいじ↓の↑一↑↓いち↓↑人↑↓にん↓が↑彼↑↓かれ↓の↑首|根↑↓くびね↓っこ|をつかんだ。
sdata.e: One of the detectives seized him by the neck.

sdata.j: ↑雑草↑↓ざっそう↓を↑抜↑↓ぬ↓くなら、|↑根↑↓ね↓っこ|から。
sdata.e: If you're going to pull weeds, pull them out by the roots.
